_header: O Thou Holy Ghost give us good dread
Subjects: Holy Ghost, gifts of; prayers, for gifts of the Holy Ghost
_description: A prayer for the Seven Gifts of the Holy Ghost — one stanza rhyme royal

Bod549.First Lines:
O thow holy Gost ȝeue vs good dreseAnd worthely thy Pyte for
                    to vndir fong…
Bod549.Last Lines:
…And trewe vnderstandyng of thyn holy wylleAnd wyth clere
                    wysdom hyt to fulfylle
Bod549.Attributed Title: The vii ȝeftys to the holy Gost (f. 78v)
